response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which I believe holds immense value for you, is now available for purchase. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am confident it will meet your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors.

To make this acquisition more appealing, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure the product at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,200,000, allowing you to benefit from a substantial discount without compromising on quality.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you decide to proceed, I would be delighted to facilitate the transaction promptly. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
